methods.name: SetSensorName
methods.description: Set Sensor Name Request.  Note that the Sensor Name is part of the BLE advertisement.

methods.name: SetSensorLocation
methods.description: User configurable string that is unused by sensor.

methods.name: SetBLEAdvertisingInterval
methods.description: Set BLE Adversiting Interval in milliseconds.

methods.name: SetBLEAdvertisingDuration
methods.description: Set BLE Adversiting Duration in milliseconds.

methods.name: SetBLEPasskey
methods.description: Set BLE Passkey.

methods.name: SetSettingsLock
methods.description: Lock out future changes to device settings.  Reserved for future use.

methods.name: SetBatterySenseInterval
methods.description: Set Battery Sense interval in seconds.  0 = disabled.

methods.name: SetTemperatureSenseInterval
methods.description: Set Temperature Sense interval in seconds.    0 = disabled.

methods.name: SetTemperatureAggregationValue
methods.description: Set Temperature Aggregation value (number of samples).

methods.name: SetDigitalOutput1
methods.description: Set Digital Output Value in millivolts

methods.name: SetDigitalOutput2
methods.description: Set Digital Output Value in millivolts

methods.name: SetDigitalInput1
methods.description: Set Digital Input Value.

params.name: p1
params.description:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

methods.name: SetDigitalInput2
methods.description: Set Digital Input Value.

params.name: p1
params.description:
0 = Switch to Ground
1 = Switch to Battery

methods.name: SetAnalogInputType
methods.description: Set Analog Input Type

methods.name: SetTemperatureAlarmThreshold
methods.description: Set Alarm Threshold in degrees C

params.name: p1
params.description: High Temperature Alarm Threshold 1 in degrees C

params.name: p2
params.description: High Temperature Alarm Threshold 2 in degrees C

params.name: p3
params.description: Low Temperature Alarm Threshold 1 in degrees C

params.name: p4
params.description: Low Temperature Alarm Threshold 2 in degrees C

methods.name: SetAnalog1AlarmThresholds
methods.description: Set Analog1 Alarm Thresholds (counts)

methods.name: SetAnalog2AlarmThresholds
methods.description: Set Analog2 Alarm Thresholds (counts)

methods.name: SetAnalog3AlarmThresholds
methods.description: Set Analog3 Alarm Thresholds (counts)

methods.name: SetAnalog4AlarmThresholds
methods.description: Set Analog4 Alarm Thresholds (counts)

methods.name: SetActiveMode
methods.description: Active Mode

methods.name: SetUseCodedPhy
methods.description: When 1 the coded phy is used as the secondary phy to send connectable but nonscannable extended advertisements.

methods.name: SetTxPower
methods.description: -40dBm, -20dBm, -16dBm, -12dBm, -8dBm, -4dBm, 0dBm, +2dBm, +3dBm, +4dBm, +5dBm, +6dBm, +7dBm and +8dBm

methods.name: SetNetworkId
methods.description: Used to group sensors. For example: Say you have 4 sensors in the warehouse and 2 in the office and you just want look at the sensors in the office you would filter on that ID

methods.name: SetConfigVersion
methods.description: The version can be used to help synchronize changes made by a phone application and a gateway.  This value is unused by the sensor.

methods.name: SetHardwareVersion
methods.description: Only the minor version can be set.

methods.name: SetLedTest
methods.description: This is for hardware testing only

params.name: p1
params.description: On off time of each LED

methods.name: GetTemperature
methods.description: Get Temperature Reading in C

items.name: r1
items.description: Temperature in hundreds of a degree C

methods.name: GetCurrent
methods.description: Get Current Reading in milliamps

methods.name: GetBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Get Battery Voltage in millivolts

methods.name: GetAlarms
methods.description: Get Alarms

items.name: r1
items.description:
Digital Input 1 Alarm.
0 = Current State
1 = State Changed

items.name: r2
items.description:
Digital Input 2 Alarm.
0 = Current State
1 = State Changed

items.name: r3
items.description:
High Temperature Alarm.
0 = No Alarm
1 = Threshold 1
2 = Threshold 2

items.name: r4
items.description:
Low Temperature Alarm.
0 = No Alarm
1 = Threshold 1
2 = Threshold 2
